title: Stylish Newcastle-upon-Tyne City Break in Historic Grainger Town
description: Celebrating the city’s tremendous past and soaring future, the neoclassical design of Hotel Indigo Newcastle, an IHG Hotel, stands boldly in the heart of historic Grainger Town, just minutes from the iconic aisles of Grainger Market. Sip classic cocktails and craft beers at Grainger Lounge, or head to Marco Pierre White Steakhouse Bar & Grill, backed by one of England’s most renowned celebrity chefs, for ultra-modern plates showcasing the region’s exceptional local produce.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Newcastle, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 2/8 Fenkle Street, Newcastle Upon Tyne, NE1 5XU, United Kingdom
